summary: Reflection brings back the level up messages found in previous Elder Scrolls titles.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UwiaI.png[/img][/center]
Author: Chesko

Contact: Forums - Chesko
E-mail - chesko.tesmod@gmail.com

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45219//?]French Translation[/url][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ybfFQ.png[/img][/center]

[center][i][b]You should rest and meditate on what you've learned.[/b][/i][/center]

[color=#FFFFAA][b]Reflection[/b][/color] tries to capture the spirit of previous entries of The Elder Scrolls series by displaying level-up messages from previous Elder Scrolls titles.

Reflection adds [color=#FFFFAA][b]over 20 level-up messages[/b][/color] from Morrowind and Oblivion. I thought that they were very charming and thought-provoking, and it was a shame that they were not present in Skyrim. Well, now they are. You will receive a new level-up message shortly after leveling up and selecting which stat to upgrade. They will start happening once every level, then once every two levels, then once every 3 levels, until you receive the last message at level 50. For some examples of the level-up messages, please see the screenshots.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/1lEkU.png[/img][/center]

[color=#FFFFAA][b]Requires the latest version of Skyrim (1.8.151.07+ as of this writing).[/b][/color] I do not support older versions of the game. I do not support cracked versions of the game.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yKjqr.png[/img][/center]

Just click [b]"Download with Manager"[/b] and activate. Nothing to it.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jJHxl.png[/img][/center]

[color=#FFFFAA][b]I installed your mod, but when I start the game, it immediately crashes.[/b][/color] You do not have the latest version of Skyrim installed.

[color=#FFFFAA][b]When I leveled up, I didn't receive a message.[/b][/color] You do not have the latest version of Skyrim installed. Or, you are not playing with a legal copy of the game. Or, it might not be a level in which you are supposed to receive a message.

Messages are received at the following levels:

2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 14, 17, 20, 23, 26, 29, 32, 35, 38, 41, 44, 47, 50.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/sMd6W.png[/img][/center]

Compatible with everything.
